name: Pora?ka
description:
SImple retro shooter created for 7dfps challange, made in more or less 3 days.

How to play

  • use the mouse to aim
  • reload with the right mouse button
  • change weapons using the mouse wheel or 1, 2, 3, 4 keys on the keyboard
  • jump using the spacebar
  • pull the lever using the left shift

Credits

  • Alicja Gołębiewska - 3D Modeling, Texturing & Illustration
  • Cezary Nowicki - 3D Modeling, Texturing, Animations
  • Bartosz Kostrowiecki - Programming, Audio Design
  • Łukasz Domański - Music
